src:
Shopee Liga 1 2019: 3 Gol Terbaik pada Pekan ke-26
05 Nov 2019, 08:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Shopee Liga 1 2019 sudah melangsungkan pertandingan pekan ke-26. Dari delapan pertandingan yang digelar, tercipta 23 gol.
Pekan ke-26 Shopee Liga 1 2019 tak bisa menuntaskan semua pertandingan yang ada. Laga Persebaya Surabaya melawan PSM Makassar terpaksa ditunda karena tim tuan rumah tak bisa mencari venue pertandingan.
Penyebabnya, Persebaya terusir dari Stadion Gelora Bung Tomo karena sebelumnya gagal mencegah suporter bertindak anarkis. Akibatnya, Persebaya terusir dan gagal mencari tempat untuk menggelar laga sehingga pertandingan terpaksa ditunda.
Meski demikian, delapan laga yang digelar tetap menghadirkan aksi-aksi menarik. Ada dua laga yang dihujani gol.
Badak Lampung berhasil mengalahkan Arema melalui drama tujuh gol. Klub berjulukan Laskar Saburai itu mengamankan poin penuh berkat kemenangan 4-3 (1/11/2019).
Sementara itu, kemenangan besar juga diraih PSIS Semarang ketika menghadapi PSS Sleman (2/11/2019). Laskar Joko Tingkir tak terbendung dan memenangi laga dengan skor 3-0.
Dilansir Bola.com, ada tiga gol yang layak masuk kategori terbaik. Penilaian gol-gol ini berasal dari proses terjadinya dengan kesulitan dalam mencetak gol.
Berikut tiga gol terbaik pada pekan ke-26 Shopee Liga 1 2019:
text:
Shopee Liga 1 2019: Best Goals of the Week 26
05 Nov 2019, 08:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Shopee Liga 1 2019 has already held its 26th week match. Of the eight matches that were held, created 23 goals.
Week 26 of Shopee Liga 1 2019 could not finish all the existing matches. Persebaya Surabaya's match against Makassar PSM was forced to be postponed because the home team could not find the match venue.
The reason, Persebaya was expelled from the Bung Tomo Gelora Stadium because it had previously failed to prevent supporters from acting anarchist. As a result, Persebaya was expelled and failed to find a place to hold the match so the match had to be postponed.
Nevertheless, the eight matches that were held still presented interesting actions. There are two matches that were bombarded with goals.
Lampung rhino defeated Arema through a seven-goal drama. The club nicknamed Laskar Saburai secured full points thanks to a 4-3 victory (1/11/2019).
Meanwhile, PSIS Semarang also won a big victory when facing PSS Sleman (2/11/2019). Laskar Joko Tingkir was unstoppable and won the match with a score of 3-0.
Reported by Bola.com, there are three goals that deserve to be in the best category. The scoring of these goals comes from the process of occurring with difficulty in scoring goals.
Here are the three best goals in Week 26 of Shopee Liga 1 2019:
